Grrr... can you have an eye on it to see whether this happens when the reference
document (e.g. CVS head) is being updated in the background?

Maybe tomorrow. For now I've disabled every fancy stuff (decorators, cvs
background, quick diff) as much as possible since I was blocked almost half day
with deadlocks, crashes, bug filing.

I20030930 + export 20031001_1151

Steps:
- create new Simple Project "zzz"
- create new file in "zzz" with name "File.txt"
- in the editor, start typing some characters
-> new log entry on every second keystroke (really after every second character!)

fixed > 20031002

DocumentLineDiffer kept initializing if the reference document was empty.
why not setting it to verified then?
